request.description: Load the postman-util-lib from github.io and load into postman global variable.

variable.value: Your Maskinporten client key kid. Can also be found in the JWK.

Input your Maskinporten JWK here. Should be on the form: 
{
        "p": "....",
        "kty": "RSA",
        "q": "....",
        "d": "...",
        "e": "AQAB",
        "use": "sig",
        "kid": "client_kid",
        "qi": "....",
        "dp": "...",
        "alg": "RS256",
        "dq": "....",
        "n": "...."
    }
